title: WinPE 10 (v10.0.10586.0)
description:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_Preinstallation_Environment#Versions



To identify the Windows PE release that you are running
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. At a Windows PE command prompt, type regedit

2. Locate this registry key:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE_SOFTWARE_Microsoft_Windows NT_CurrentVersion_WinPE

The Version registry value shows the Windows PE version



1. Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 (v10.1.25.813) Business:            
http://www.paragon-software.com/small-business/hdm-business/


2. Symantec Ghost 12.0.0.8027 Corporate Edition:            
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost_(software)


3. StorageCraft ShadowProtect 5.2.5.37836:        
http://www.storagecraft.com/products/overviews/storagecraft-shadowprotect


4. Paragon Alignment Tool 4.0 Professional:            
http://www.paragon-software.com/home/partition-alignment/


5. HDClone 6.0.5 Enterprise Edition:            
https://www.miray.de/products/applications/hdclone6/enterprise-edition.html


6. EaseUS Todo Backup 9.1:            
http://www.todo-backup.com/business/advanced-server-backup.htm





Burn winpe_x86.iso onto cd/dvd to create bootable media including the above apps.

In order to create a bootable USB, extract winpe_x86.iso using WinRAR and drop the contents onto bootable USB made using the following guide: http://theitbros.com/formatting-winpe-3-1-flash-drive-dism/
